52086.「ふむ。いきなりは 恥ずかしいものですな。\n 私は いつでも 冒険者のご協力を:
Hmm. It's a little embarrassing to come out of nowhere... I'm always looking for adventurers to help me... Please come
again...

52088.「……おお。\n 新たに 討伐数が <%nM_qualify>匹に達した\n モ:
..... Looks like there's a new monster that's
reached <%nM_qualify> kills!

52089.「……ふむふむ。新たに 討伐数が目標数に達した\n モンスターは いないようです:
... Well... It appears that no new monsters have reached the target number of kills... Monsters that have reached their target
number of kills will be marked with a medal in their name on the list of monsters killed. If you see a monster with a medal, please
come and see me. Monsters that have already received a medal will be marked with a crown. I've given away <%nM_value100> medals for
killing 100 monsters, <%nM_value20> medals for killing 200 monsters, <%nM_value20> medals for killing 300 monsters, and
<%nM_value20> medals for killing 300 monsters. 300 medals for killing 300 fish <%nM_value300> 400 medals for killing 400
fish <%nM_value400> 5 <%nM_value50... <%nM_value600> for 600 fish killed, <%nM_value700> for 700 fish killed 8
<%nM_value80... <%nM_value900> for killing 900 monsters <%nM_value100> for killing 1000 monsters So far, I've killed <%nM_m_record>
kinds of monsters and <%nM_valuetype> medals...

52091.「おお！ <pc>殿！\n みごと すべてのモンスターの\n <%nM_qual:
Oh! My Lord! You have successfully defeated <%nM_qualify> all of the monsters! Now that you've helped us defeat the monsters, we can
proceed on our own... We thank you for your cooperation so far. There may come a day in the future when we ask you adventurers to do
something for us... If so, please accept my request... So, have a good journey...

52092.「<pc>殿のおかげで\n あとは 我々だけで 討伐を進められます。\n これま:
Thanks to you, we can now proceed with our mission on our own. We would like to thank you for your cooperation so far... There may
come a day in the future when we ask you adventurers to do something for us... If so, please accept my request... So, have a good
journey...

52093.「ちいさなメダルを もらえる状態の\n モンスターは 討伐モンスターリストの\n:
Monsters that are eligible to receive a small medal will be marked with a medal in their name on the list of defeated monsters... If
you see a monster with a medal, please come back... Monsters that have already received a medal will be marked with a crown. I've given
away <%nM_value100> medals for every 100 monsters killed, and <%nM_value20> medals for every 200 monsters killed. 300 medals for
killing 300 fish <%nM_value300> 400 medals for killing 400 fish <%nM_value400> 5 <%nM_value50... <%nM_value600> for 600 fish
killed, <%nM_value700> for 700 fish killed 8 <%nM_value80... <%nM_value900> for killing 900 monsters <%nM_value100> for killing 1000
monsters So far, I've killed <%nM_m_record> kinds of monsters and <%nM_valuetype> medals...

52094.「冒険者の方 こんにちは！\n 私は 各国連合モンスター討伐隊\n 隊長の ウェ:
Hello, adventurers! My name is Werner, and I am the leader of the United Nations Monster Strike Force! Our strike force is a special
organization specially appointed by the nations of the world to defeat the monsters that have become active due to the outbreak
of the magical miasma. We've been dispatching troops to dangerous areas around the world, but to fill the shortage, we're asking for
the help of you adventurers... The number of monsters you have defeated is listed in the list of monsters defeated in the war record.
We will be checking that list... For every 100 monsters you kill, we will give you a small medallion. We, the Defeat Team... There
are some monsters that are not included in the list. Please refer to the indentations to the left of the monster's name on the monster
list. To encourage more players to defeat monsters, for every 100 monsters you defeat, you will receive an additional 50 small
medals... Your name is ..... Sir... Then, may I see your battle record for confirmation?

52096.「私は いつでも 冒険者のご協力を\n お待ちしております。またお越しください。:
I'm always happy to help adventurers...
Please come back...<end>

52097.「<pc>殿 こんにちは！\n 我が討伐隊では 多くのモンスターを倒した\n 冒:
Hello, sir! Our strike force provides small medals to adventurers who kill the most monsters. Now, could you please show me your
battle record so that I can check the results?

52098.「以上！ 合計で <%nM_value>枚分になります！\n 冒険者の ご協力に:
That's all! That's a total of <%nM_value> pieces! Thank you adventurers for your cooperation! This will be the promised
reward!

59322.「<pc>殿 こんにちは！\n 最近 魔瘴の活発化が さらに進行し\n モンスタ:
Hello, Mister! Recently, the demon miasma has become more and more active, and the number of monsters has been increasing. So, in
addition to the 100 monsters we've killed so far, we've decided to ask you, our adventurers, to help us kill 600 monsters...
If you report back to us after you've killed 600 monsters, we'll give you a small medal, just like we did when we killed 100 monsters.
I'll give you a medal... Now, could you please show me your battle record so I can check the results?

59330.「……おお。\n 新たに 討伐数が目標数に達した\n モンスターが いるようです:
..... Looks like there's a new monster that's
reached its target number of kills!

72247.「<pc>殿！\n 超大型モンスターの襲来によって\n ガケっぷち村が壊滅した件:
Sir! Have you heard about the destruction of the village by the attack of a super-sized monster? In order to combat this crisis, we,
the Defeat Squad, have decided to step up our efforts to defeat the monsters and ask you adventurers to help us defeat 700 of them!
From now on, for every 100 monsters we kill, up to a maximum of 700, we will give you a small medal! So let's get started. Can you
show us your battle records so we can check the results?

82139.「<pc>殿 こんにちは！\n グランドタイタス号が 出港されましたが\n レン:
Hello, sir. The Grand Titus has sailed, but has it made it to the continent of Lendershya? We, the strike force, are on our
way to survey the land of Lendershere, but due to the amount of damage we have sustained from the monsters, we have been forced to
forgo our survey... I have a proposal for you! I'd like to ask all of you adventurers to help us defeat 700 monsters. From now on,
for every 100 monsters killed, up to a maximum of 700, we'll give you a small medal! So let's get started. Can I see your battle
record?

90576.「こんにちは <pc>殿！\n 以前 お話した レンダーシアの調査ですが\n ま:
Hello My Lord! The investigation into Lendermere I mentioned earlier will soon be ready... However, with so many of my men out
preparing, I'm afraid I won't have time to take down the monsters. So I have a request... I've already asked you to take
down 800 monsters, but I'd like you to step it up and take down 1,000. I'd like to ask you, sir... From now on, for every 100 of them, up to a maximum of 1,000, we will give you a small medal. For every 100
monsters killed, we will give you a small medal! Also, to further encourage the defeat of monsters, for every 100 monsters you
defeat, you will receive an additional 50 Tiny Medals... Now, could you please show us your battle record so that we can confirm the
results?

122527.「……おお。\n どうやら 倒したモンスターの種類が\n 目標数に達しているよう:
..... Looks like you've reached your target
number of monsters killed!

122528.「……おお。\n 新たに 討伐数が目標数に達した\n モンスターが いるようです:
..... Looks like there's a new monster that's
reached its target number of kills!

122529.<color_yellow>「倒したモンスター <%nM_qualify>種 達:
<color_yellow>Defeated monster <%nM_qualify> species
achieved! You will receive 50 medals as a
reward...<color_white>
<se_nots System 7>
<break>
